name: Stroll To The Späti
description:
A stroll to the Späti is a Narrative Podcast game which aims to give a real slice of life, paper-thin and yet strong enough with its honest intimacy. As we manage ourselves through hard times, this game offers you to talk to your surroundings about what's been on their mind as you try to make your way to the Späti to buy your cigarettes.

Part of the Next Door project Course by Stamm at UE - Berlin

Currently, the very first version avaiable. 

Mind you: The audio is not fixed yet and therefor BROKEN, certain assets are missing. Controls through clicking and holding SHIFT to run. The gameloop is not fully there.

Will be updated with a newer version very soon!
